entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 after midnight. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:24 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then light snow. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning. Wind chill minus 42 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:24 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
